column1: '''Falathrin''' was the [[Sindarin]] dialect of the [[Falathrim]] (also used in  [[Nargothrond]]{{fact}})
column2: of which not much is known. It is told that the dialect "was in many ways different" from other forms of Sindarin
column3: but not enough "to interfere with intercourse".<ref>{{WJ|Quendi}}
